title: Pilgrim's Farewell
verses:
Fare-well, fare-well, farewell,dear friends,I
must be gone, I have no home or stay with you; I'll
take my staff and trav-el on, Till I a bet-ter
world do view. I'll march to Canaan's land, I'll
land on Canaan's shore,Where pleasures never end,Where

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Expresses the Christian's journey as a pilgrimage to the promised land
